name: Panda Evolution - Halloween Clicker Games
description:
Black-eyed, chubby-figured, short-limbed...And endangered! Yes, pandas are nature treasure as well as adorable gift. But what would happen if mutations take place among pandas? Find it out in Panda Evolution!
Still remember Hippo Evolution? The game which completely changes your opinion towards hippos. Here comes a new one that seems to be even more insane and unconventional.
"My hands just cannot stop tapping!" - Mr. Pancake
"Once upon a time, there were thousands of pandas living in the deep bamboo forest happily. One day, aliens came to adopt most of them, the big panda family suffered." - Panasia
It's well known that pandas are rare and special creatures on Earth. They are black and white. They are mammals. They are vegetarians. They are greatly strong. They can stand up. They have been born to be unique. What would happen if these amazing creatures mutate?
God is elusive, but the evolution is even more unpredictable. Mix, match, mingle and evolve regular pandas to what-the-heck new species of pandas and conquer the whole cosmos and BEYOND!

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag two same pandas together to combine and create new mysterious creatures
• Use coins from pooping to buy more creatures as well as making more money
• Freely, fiercely tap pandas to make coins pop when they poop

HIGHLIGHTS
• 4 different stages and many pandas species to expect
• A thrilling story yet uncovered
• The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution, 2048 and incremental clicker games
• Graffiti style illustrations
• Five possible endings await
• No pandas get hurt in the making of this game, only game makers

Take action to help mutations among pandas. Download it and enjoy the mutation and evolution in Panda Evolution now!
